revised_prompt: Create a professional banner advertisement for a tech store's Black Friday Sale. The dimensions required are 1200x628 pixels. The design should display the brand name, 'TechStore', in a large, bold, and the most prominent fashion. In terms of visibility, the next element should be the main message, 'Up to 70% Off', located in the center area with medium size. Finally, a call-to-action button with the text 'Shop Now' should display in a bright color, at the bottom or in a prominent position. The style should embody clean, modern, and professional advertising, ensuring high contrast between the text and background for optimal readability. The color scheme must be vibrant and eye-catching but still maintain a professional look. Keep the background clean or subtle to avoid interfering with text readability. Aim for a simple and uncluttered layout, highlighting the sans-serif typography, and maintain a high professional advertising standard.
